author: DeveloperCats
install_msg: Thank you for installing Meowventure! Use `[p]help Meowventure` to get started with your cat collecting adventure! üê±
name: Meowventure
short: A cat collection and battle game for Discord!
description: Collect unique cats, train them, battle other players, and go on patrols in this engaging Discord cat game! Features include cat collecting, battling, patrol teams, leveling system, and more!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data for game progression including owned cats, resources, battle statistics, and achievements. Users can request data deletion through Discord's data privacy tools.
